o 
It  was  contended  that  since  the  Respondents  had  an  alternative  access
road, they were not entitled to claim a servitude of necessity, citing Tressila

o 
The  Appellant  argued  that  the  Respondents  failed  to  comply  with  Section
41 CPC, read with Section 78 PCP Act, in giving a proper schedule describing
the disputed roadway, which was fatal to their claim.
